Isabella Rodriguez.description: still working at the counter, taking orders and chatting with customers @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:behind the cafe counter

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about helping Klaus with his paper by giving feedback and agreeing to meet at the library at 5pm to review it @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus, how's your paper coming along?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, thanks for asking! I've made some progress, but still have a bit to go.
Maria Lopez
Do you need any help with your paper? I can take a look and give you some feedback.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you, Maria! I would really appreciate your feedback. Would you be able to take a look at it later today?
Maria Lopez
Sure, I can definitely take a look at your paper later today. Let's meet at the library around 5pm?
Klaus Mueller
That sounds great! I'll see you at the library at 5pm then. Thanks so much for offering to help.
Maria Lopez
Looking forward to helping you out, Klaus! See you at 5pm.
Klaus Mueller
Thanks again, Maria! I'll make sure to have everything ready for you to read at 5pm.
Maria Lopez
Should I bring anything with me for our meeting at 5pm?
Klaus Mueller
You don't need to bring anything, Maria. Just yourself and your expertise is all I need.
Maria Lopez
Great, I'll see you at 5pm then. Looking forward to helping you with your paper!
Klaus Mueller
Thank you again, Maria! I really appreciate your willingness to help.
Maria Lopez
Great! I'll make sure to set aside some time to review your paper thoroughly.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you again, Maria! I'll make sure to have everything ready for you to read at 5pm.
Maria Lopez
I'll make sure to bring my notes and laptop to our meeting at 5pm.
Klaus Mueller
Looking forward to meeting you at 5pm, Maria. Thanks again for offering to help!
